author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: More on the new special.
body:
The title may be one of two things...
Lupin the Third: One Dollar Money Woes
or
Lupin the Third: One Dollar Money Wars

The new characters and voice actors are:
Cynthia: Koyama, Matsumi
Sandie: Matsumoto, Rika

CORRECTION: Bow is not something up for auction, its
the name of a bank. My mistake.

More later.
